reviews.review_msg: Class was fun and wasn't all that difficult, but she doesn't really do a good job in describing at times.
She's helpful sometimes, but you wont get what shes talking about. Then she will just give up and you'll realize that google can do a better job.
She's unclear, not that great at explaining things. Nice, but I don't feel much better in French after taking the course. Take it with the other teacher if you can, she's much cooler.
